dmca.title: [EV1-C1629230Y] URGENT--COPYRIGHT TAKE DOWN NOTICE
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] 
Posted At: Wednesday, November 01, 2006 8:45 AM
Posted To: DMCA
Conversation: [EV1-C1629230Y] URGENT--COPYRIGHT TAKE DOWN NOTICE
Subject: [EV1-C1629230Y] URGENT--COPYRIGHT TAKE DOWN NOTICE

X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00

TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED

MIME element (text/plain)
Re:  SADIKHOV.COM 
 
Dear Sir or Madam: 
Red Hat, Inc. is aware of a website located at
http://www.sadikhov.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=67187 that has
copyrighted material owned by Red Hat, Inc. posted on this site.  The
material was posted by "Deepak Gen".  DNS records indicate that
Everyones Internet is hosting the above website. As a result, Red Hat
demands this material be immediately taken down from the site and to
notify Red Hat as to the full contact information for the person that
posted the material to the site, in particular "Deepak Gen." 
 
On behalf of Red Hat, Inc., I verify that Red Hat, Inc. is the owner of
the copyright to this material.  Please confirm that you have received
this message and that you immediately take action or provide me with the
contact information for the person that owns this website. 
 
I look forward to hearing from you. 
 
Sincerely,
Susie Rollheiser
Legal Affairs
Red Hat, Inc. 
1801 Varsity Drive
Raleigh, NC 27606
919-754-4280
